full_text: Page 2354 Fwd: Re: Interviews From [b(6); (b)(7)(C) To Date 2019/09/03 11:32 Subject: Fwd: Re: Interviews Attachments: TEXT.htm Hello all, I just spoke with Special Agent [b(6); (b)(7)(C) requested to meet with him for my interview on 9/6/19 at 9:00 or 10:00 a.m. He will follow-up with me to advise if this time works well. Very respectfully, [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Ph.D. Forensic Psychologist LT, U.S. Public Health Service U.S. Department of Justice Federal Bureau of Prisons Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 Office: 646.83[b(6); (b)(7)(C) Fax: 646.836.7712 E-mail: [b(6); (b)(7)(C)]@bop.gov If you are emailing about an inmate that may be at risk for suicide or self-harm, this is an emergency situation. Please ensure you make verbal contact with Psychology Staff or the on-call psychologist. Please ensure to maintain constant visual observation of the inmate until formal steps can be taken to ensure his/her safety pending a formal assessment by a Psychologist. "This message is intended for official use and may contain SENSITIVE information. If this message contains SENSITIVE information, it should be properly delivered, labeled, stored, and disposed of according to policy." >> [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] 8/16/2019 1:43 PM >>> Good afternoon, Per the below, OIG would like to interview you regarding the incident last weekend involving EPSTEIN, Jeffrey, reg. no. 76318-054. Please call Special Agent [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] at 202-853-[b(6); (b)(7)(C)] at your convenience. Thank you, [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] Page 13755 DOJ-OGR-00026043

text_blocks.content: Fwd: Re: Interviews From [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] To Date 2019/09/03 11:32 Subject: Fwd: Re: Interviews Attachments: TEXT.htm
Hello all, I just spoke with Special Agent [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] requested to meet with him for my interview on 9/6/19 at 9:00 or 10:00 a.m. He will follow-up with me to advise if this time works well.

Very respectfully, [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] Ph.D. Forensic Psychologist LT, U.S. Public Health Service U.S. Department of Justice Federal Bureau of Prisons Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 Office: 646.83[b(6); (b)(7)(C)] Fax: 646.836.7712 E-mail: [b(6); (b)(7)(C)]@bop.gov

If you are emailing about an inmate that may be at risk for suicide or self-harm, this is an emergency situation. Please ensure you make verbal contact with Psychology Staff or the on-call psychologist. Please ensure to maintain constant visual observation of the inmate until formal steps can be taken to ensure his/her safety pending a formal assessment by a Psychologist.

"This message is intended for official use and may contain SENSITIVE information. If this message contains SENSITIVE information, it should be properly delivered, labeled, stored, and disposed of according to policy."

>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] 8/16/2019 1:43 PM >>> Good afternoon, Per the below, OIG would like to interview you regarding the incident last weekend involving EPSTEIN, Jeffrey, reg. no. 76318-054. Please call Special Agent [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] at 202-853-[b(6); (b)(7)(C)] at your convenience.

additional_notes: The document contains multiple redactions of personal information marked as [b(6); (b)(7)(C)]. The content appears to be an official email communication regarding an interview with an inmate, Jeffrey Epstein, and contains sensitive information.
